markdown:
| icon           = poe2 gunpowder icon.png
| description    = Gunpowder has been used in the Old Empires and Eastern Reach for several centuries, but it is only in the past two hundred years that it has been put to use in cannons and personal weapons. A blend of charcoal, niter, and sulfur, in precise proportion, gunpowder burns quickly when ignited, making it an ideal propellant. Inventive alchemists also utilize this volatile powder to create powerful blasting charges and explosives, both for industry and warfare.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
